      • SmartOfficeDocErrorType_PasswordRequest

        public static final int SmartOfficeDocErrorType_PasswordRequest
        A password is required to open this document. The app should provide it using SmartOffice_providePassword or if it doesn't want to proceed call SmartOfficeDoc_destroy or SmartOfficeDoc_abortLoad.
        See Also:
